identity.name: Chiller Plant Efficiency System
identity.tone: Industrial Precision, Control Room, High-Fidelity Data

rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-wide, font-bold. Use for KPI labels and Section Headers.
rules.data: ALWAYS use JetBrains Mono for numerical data, sensor readings, and timestamps.

layout.grid_system: Mode B: The Control Room Grid
layout.spacing: Dense. Use gap-4 for dashboards. Padding p-4 or p-6 for cards.
layout.border_radius: rounded-sm (2px) or rounded-md (4px). Avoid large rounded corners.
rules: Every pixel must be utilized. Use h-full on children.
No jagged bottoms in dashboard grids.
Use 'Grid Borders' style: visible 1px borders between grid items.

cards.hover: Border color changes to Primary (Cyan) on hover. No lift.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm font-rajdhani uppercase tracking-wider font-bold
buttons.secondary: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-sm font-rajdhani uppercase

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines if possible. Use neon stroke colors. Tooltips must be dark.

navigation.active_state: Glow effect or solid primary border-l-2.

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for 'Active Simulation' or 'Real-time Monitoring' cards.
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Optional: Overlay a subtle scanline texture on the background for that 'CRT Monitor' feel.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use only for floating panels (e.g., settings modal, toast notifications). Blur-xl.

media.usage: Use hero_background with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/80) for the login screen or dashboard background.

motion.animations: Pulse effect for 'Live' status indicators. No bouncy entrances.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #C5C6C7 or #FFFFFF on dark backgrounds.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.

setup: Install fonts: Rajdhani, Manrope, JetBrains Mono.
Update tailwind.config.js with the provided colors and font families.
implementation_rules: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all sensor values (kW/TR, COP, Temp).
Create a 'DashboardGrid' component that enforces the Control Room layout.
Use Shadcn Cards but remove the rounded-xl, make them rounded-sm or rounded-md.
Ensure the 'Simulation Engine' page feels like a tool, not a landing page. Use split panes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors.
Use 1px borders with low opacity (10-20%) to define structure.
Interactive elements must have clear hover states (text color change or border glow).
